featured.text: 22 other possible transmission routes, researchers at Virginia Tech observed water drops on the leaves of wheat plants that were infected with leaf rust.
They found that the sick plants could “sneeze” and 23 tiny water drops filled with leaf rust germs, spreading the disease to neighboring plants.

definition.zh_def: 鐵或其他金屬表面上形成的紅棕色氧化物，通常因潮濕或暴露於空氣中而產生。
definition.en_def: A reddish-brown oxide formed on iron or other metals due to oxidation, typically caused by moisture or exposure to air.
definition.example: The old bicycle was covered in rust after being left outside for years.
